eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A 911 TELEPHONE OUTAGE EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Coconino, AZ; AT 02:44 PM ON NOV 21, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:44 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Urgent Per CCSO: Due to cell coverage challenges in the greater Bellemont and Parks area, if you cannot reach 911 by calling, text 911 to report your emergency.
